TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit FontFamilyConverter extends System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter

Docs.summary: Converts instances of the <see cref="T:System.String"> type to and from <xref:System.Windows.Media.FontFamily> instances.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

.method public hidebysig virtual instance bool CanConvertFrom(class System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext td, class System.Type t) cil managed

Docs.param: Describes the context information of a type.
The type of the source that is being evaluated for conversion.
Docs.summary: Determines whether a class can be converted from a given type to an instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.FontFamily">.
Docs.returns: `true` if the converter can convert from the specified type to an instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.FontFamily">; otherwise, `false`.

remarks.format: ## Remarks <xref:System.Windows.Media.FontFamilyConverter> supports conversion to and from the <xref:System.String> type.

MemberSignature.Value: public override bool CanConvertTo (System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext context, Type destinationType);
.method public hidebysig virtual instance bool CanConvertTo(class System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext context, class System.Type destinationType) cil managed

Docs.param: Describes the context information of a type.
The desired type that this instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.FontFamily"> is being evaluated for conversion.
Docs.summary: Determines whether an instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.FontFamily"> can be converted to a different type.
Docs.returns: `true` if the converter can convert this instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.FontFamily"> to the specified type; otherwise, `false`.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Conversion is possible only if is a <xref:System.Windows.Media.FontFamily> type, and is a <xref:System.String> type. In addition, the <xref:System.Windows.Media.FontFamily.Source%2A> property for cannot be null or equal to <xref:System.String.Empty>, which identifies as an anonymous <xref:System.Windows.Media.FontFamily>.
